Class Cutscene

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class Cutscene
extends GameLoop
    Creates cutscene animation for level 2.

      • Cutscene

        public Cutscene(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage,
                int width,
                int height,
                int scene,
                int flowSceneNum)
        Constructor for the Cutscene class. Calls the constructor of the superclass and sets the width and height of the stage.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - the stage which the scene appears on
        width - the width of the stage
        height - the height of the stage
        scene - the scene number
        flowSceneNum - the number of scene changes
        Since:
        1.10
